name: GRAVITY DAZE
description:
Themes:   1) Indirect Player control  2) Two Button Controls

Use the mouse wheel to rotate the world (Up for counter clockwise and Down for clockwise) and manipulate gravity to finish levels.

Avoid Buzz-saws, Spikes and Electric Doors

(H-Help; I-Info; Space-Starts game in main menu)

Collect all apples to unlock the final door to reach the color star and win the level
